::Reptilica::

Reptilica looks at the scanners as another ship crashes near the Iron 
Fist.

"I'll get it," he says, his tone suggesting that bots crashing on 
past earth were as common as someone calling on the phone. Reptilica 
walks out of the Iron Fist, jetting off toward the new ship. He lands 
near it, looking at it and waiting to see if there were any conscious 
bots onboard.







--- In nbwrpg@y..., Adiv Johnson <Chrono_Cross85704@y...> wrote:
> 
> *Darkreaper swiftly emerges from the sky in a ship
> seeming to engulf in flames of pitch black darkness as
> he crashes within a 3-mile distance near the Iron Fist
